title: From Our Home Correspondent 17/09/2017
content: Mishal Husain presents dispatches on one family's fraught experience with sepsis, the night Jimi Hendrix played Ilkley and the prospects for coracle fishing in West Wales.
contentSnippet: Mishal Husain presents dispatches on one family's fraught experience with sepsis, the night Jimi Hendrix played Ilkley and the prospects for coracle fishing in West Wales.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 4
itunes.subtitle: Ilkley's Hendrix experience, one family's struggle with sepsis and Welsh coracle fishing
itunes.summary: Mishal Husain presents dispatches on one family's fraught experience with sepsis, the night Jimi Hendrix played Ilkley and the prospects for coracle fishing in West Wales.
